“我们会时刻响应指挥部的号令！”.Translation: “We will always respond to the command center's orders!”

“…了解，我们会尽力完成任务…”.Translation: “…Understood, we will do our best to complete the mission…”

“祝你们武运昌隆，衔尾蛇小队。循此苦旅，直抵群星。”.Translation: “May your fortunes prevail, Ouroboros Squad. Follow this arduous journey, and reach for the stars.”

“该死，信号从这里就断开了，接下来要靠我们自己了。”.Translation: “Damn it, the signal cuts off here. From now on, we’re on our own.”

“长官，尽管遇到了一些挫折，我们还是圆满完成任务。我们从apollyon设施中带.Translation: “Sir, despite some setbacks, we’ve successfully completed the mission. We retrieved the final key, Sirius, from the Apollyon facility.”

“长官，您的意思是...我们将无法接收到指挥部的指令与分析结果...”.Translation: “Sir, are you saying... we won’t receive command center directives or analysis reports...”

不过指挥部还是通过〈机神〉分析了那里的地形，利用地势差的明显变化找到了基地的一处.Translation: However, the command center used Mechagod to analyze the terrain and located a base entrance by leveraging elevation differences.

但是，灯塔基地作为计划的最终目标，自然也藏有重重保护措施，外界的信号似乎无法向内.Translation: But as the final objective of the plan, the Lighthouse Base is heavily fortified — external signals can’t penetrate, and even the Afterglow system can’t modify its shielding frequency.

你们将继承他们的意志，启动灯塔，完成Ragnarok计划的最后一步….Translation: You will inherit their will, activate the Lighthouse, and complete the final step of Project Ragnarok…

再坚守一会，这里的排风系统很快就会过载，将他们烧成灰烬.Translation: Hold a little longer — the ventilation system here will overload soon and burn them to ashes.

在你们到来前，“落雪”小队负责对基地的探索，但是全部下落不明，无法再接收他们的救.Translation: Before your arrival, Team ‘Falling Snow’ was tasked with exploring the base, but all members went missing. We lost their distress signals, and command presumes they’re KIA. If it’s you, we hope you’ll find traces of them.

它被前任灯塔操纵官安置在灯塔ALPHA基地中.Translation: It was placed in Lighthouse ALPHA Base by the former Lighthouse Operator.

实验体已被击败，快离开这里!.Translation: The test subject has been defeated—get out of here now!

干得漂亮，我们永远信任衔尾蛇精英小队的办事能力。现如今，你们已经拿到了三把启动“.Translation: Well done. We’ve always trusted the Ouroboros elite squad’s capabilities. Now, you’ve obtained three activation keys for the Lighthouse: ‘Procyon’, ‘Betelgeuse’, and ‘Sirius’.

战士们，你们已经越过重重困难，准备迎接你们最后的考验，既分高下，也决生死。.Translation: Warriors, you’ve overcome countless trials. Now prepare for your final test—one that will decide victory, defeat, and life or death.

所有人员注意！灯塔ALPHA设施已进入待发射阶段，请尽快远离核心区域，等待下一步.Translation: All personnel, attention! Lighthouse ALPHA facility is in standby launch phase. Evacuate the core area immediately and await further instructions.

正是如此，因此这里也被称作“落雪长眠之地”，因地处高纬极寒地带，基地外部常年被冰.Translation: Exactly. Hence, this place is also called ‘Falling Snow’s Resting Ground’. Located in a polar high-latitude zone, the base is perpetually shrouded in ice and snow, surrounded by towering mountain ranges — its concealment is unparalleled...

现在只剩下最后一把....Translation: Now, only the last one remains...

衔尾蛇小队，我收到了你们此次行动的代号，你们的行动就称作破晓…（信号断开，滋滋声.Translation: Ouroboros Squad, I’ve received your operation codename. Your mission shall be called ‘Daybreak’… (signal cuts off, static)

这也是你们此行的最后一站....Translation: This is also the final stop of your journey...

这里是AOH指挥部中心，接到管理层通知，前来询问你们在APOLLYON计划的进程.Translation: This is AOH Command Center. Per executive request, we’re inquiring about your progress in Project APOLLYON.

这里的气候有些不对劲，快躲起来！.Translation: The weather here feels off — take cover!

NOBODY议员：…你什么时候能加入DOC，我已经老了，他们总是把难活交给我干….Translation: Councilor NOBODY: …When will you join DOC? I’m getting old, and they always dump the hard tasks on me…

NOBODY议员：为什么要动用你的力量帮助他们实现Ragnarok计划，这是对D.Translation: Councilor NOBODY: Why use your power to aid their Ragnarok Plan? This insults DOC. They interfere to prevent extreme scenarios…

NOBODY议员：收到，我正在传达分支指令，告诉我他们的目标。.Translation: Councilor NOBODY: Received. Relaying branch directives now. Tell me their objective.

NOBODY议员：晨星MS议会已经与AOH取得了合作，他们启动灯塔，无疑是对地外.Translation: Councilor NOBODY: The Morning Star MS Council has allied with AOH. Their activation of the Lighthouse is a declaration to extraterrestrial civilizations—we’re just following orders…

Pleiades议员：接收到上级指令，我们要将目标对准….Translation: Councilor Pleiades: Higher-order directive received. We must target…

Pleiades议员：老兄，上面下达了新的指令，要求我们启动ECLIPSE震颤引.Translation: Councilor Pleiades: Buddy, new orders from above—activate the ECLIPSE Tremor Engine. You’d better hurry…

“...我代表衔尾蛇小队，向您致敬！”.Translation: “...On behalf of Ouroboros Squad, I salute you!”

“MS的增员来了！我能听到战斗机引擎的轰鸣声！”.Translation: “MS reinforcements are here! I can hear the fighter engines roaring!”

“不好！上面的防火门快撑不住了，快离开这里！”.Translation: “Damn! The fireproof door above won’t hold — get out now!”

“为什么…落雪小队究竟发生了什么…”.Translation: “Why… what really happened to Falling Snow Squad…”

“他们从两边进攻了，守住这里，我去启动电力系统...”.Translation: “They’re attacking from both sides! Hold this position — I’ll restart the power system...”

“他们都长眠于此，只有我还苟延残喘…我看着他们每一个人在极寒中垂死挣扎…到最后，.Translation: “They all rest here, only I linger… I watched each of them struggle in the freezing cold… in the end, I couldn’t save a single one…”

“但愿…灯塔启动后，你们在群星的微光中还能找到我们的身影...”.Translation: “I hope… after the Lighthouse activates, you’ll still find us in the starlight...”

“你为什么要这么做…我们可以一起离开…也许…我们应该冷静下来想想别的办法…”.Translation: “Why are you doing this… we could leave together… maybe… we should calm down and think of another way…”

“你们需要重新恢复设施的运行，冷却池另外一端的大门或许可以把你们带到电力系统...Translation: “You need to restore facility operations—the door at the far end of the coolant pool might lead to the power system...

“保安室的门无法开启，这里的电路可能有问题，去上方的平台上看看！”.Translation: “Security room door won’t open—circuitry here might be faulty. Check the platform above!”

“准备启动Ragnarok协议，对近卫炮蓄能”.Translation: “Preparing to initiate Ragnarok Protocol—charging sentry cannons.”

“出口的路被堵死了，我们只能另寻僻径...”.Translation: “The exit’s blocked—we’ll have to find another path...”

“前面就是升降梯了，从这里应该可以到达主控室，但是要小心这里的感染者，不要让他们.Translation: “The elevator’s ahead—this should lead to the control room. But watch for infected here—don’t let them board the platform!”

“千般荒凉，以此为梦…这是我的死地，也是我的归宿，牺牲是为了帮助你们走更长的路，.Translation: “A thousand desolations, this dream of mine… my grave, my home. My sacrifice paves your path forward. Remember to carry Falling Snow’s will back to HQ — always follow in your footsteps...”

“升降门将在15秒后开启”.Translation: “The lift gate will open in 15 seconds.”

“可是，您现在已经身负重伤…应该尽快得到医治…”.Translation: “But sir, you’re gravely wounded… you need medical attention now...”

“启动核心需要四把钥匙同时扭动，我在核心设计图纸上见过...”.Translation: “Activating the core requires turning all four keys simultaneously—I saw it in the blueprints...”

“唔，好刺鼻的气味，这里应该是废水处理室”.Translation: “Ugh, pungent smell—this must be the wastewater treatment room.”

“嗯！拉着Asterac队长，注意看好他的伤势...我们会尽快寻求支援。”.Translation: “Got it! Hold Captain Asterac, mind his injuries… we’ll call for backup ASAP.”

“坚持60秒，这个生物好像很虚弱，注意躲避他的攻击”.Translation: “Hold for 60 seconds—this creature seems weak. Dodge its attacks.”

“坦克似乎还能用，驾驶它炸碎大门！”.Translation: “The tank might still work—drive it and blast the gate open!”

“大门好像锁死了，我们先去主控室，从那里的梯子上去。”.Translation: “The gate’s locked. Let’s head to the control room first—climb the ladder there.”

“大门的电力不够，可能是电箱故障，快去上面检查电箱。”.Translation: “The gate’s underpowered—fuse box might be faulty. Check it upstairs.”

“好了！你们这些感染者！我将带着你们堕入地狱！”.Translation: “Done! You infected bastards! I’ll drag you all to hell!”

“好像起作用了，不过室内的温度在迅速上升，你们尽快离开那里，但是不要让感染者进入.Translation: “It’s working, but the room’s heating up fast—get out now! But don’t let infected breach the gate...

“好烫！该死的蒸汽！注意避开破损的管道！”.Translation: “Hot! Damn steam! Avoid the broken pipes!”

“如今灯塔已经启动，我必须延续落雪小队的遗志，AOH派你们前来，是为了延续人类的.Translation: “Now that the Lighthouse is active, I must fulfill Falling Snow’s legacy. AOH sent you to prolong humanity’s twilight… they died here. I think… I’ll go to them…”

“如果你们方便的话，请求上传你们的行动代号。”.Translation: “If possible, please upload your operation codename.”

“带好Asterac队长，我们要拼一把！所有人，准备好迎接至暗时刻！”.Translation: “Secure Captain Asterac — we’re going all in! Everyone, brace for the darkest hour!”

“感染者还在源源不断涌入，总控室的基站如果被毁，那Ragnarok任务也将落幕….Translation: “Infected keep pouring in — if the control room base station is destroyed, Mission Ragnarok ends… Falling Snow’s sacrifice will be in vain…”

“我之前尝试从这里的其他输水管道里寻求生机，但里面黑灯瞎火，我不敢贸然前进....Translation: “I tried escaping through other water pipes, but they’re pitch black — I didn’t dare go further...”

“我从研究部带来了他们遗留的试验品，这些电磁地雷你们带着，或许能派上用场...”.Translation: “I brought experimental gear from R&D — these EMP mines might help...”

“我代表MS祝你们好运！”.Translation: “On behalf of MS, I wish you luck!”

“我们的支援已经在向上攀升，马上就能抵达核心区域。”.Translation: “Our backup is ascending — they’ll reach the core soon.”

“我们的行动代号？我想...我们此次的行动就称作...”.Translation: “Our operation codename? I think... we’ll call this mission...”

“我听见有水流声，这下面应该是一个输水管道，我们只能从这里撤离了...”.Translation: “I hear water — must be a pipeline below. Our only way out...”

“我将电力系统重启了，下面的门应该快启动了...不对！里面是感染者，快离开那里！.Translation: “I rebooted the power — the door below should activate soon... Wait! Infected inside! Get away!

“我已经身受重伤…基地中出现了许多未知的生物，他们几乎毁灭了我们整个小队，我在这.Translation: “I’m badly wounded… unknown creatures in the base wiped out our squad. I searched for survivors, stumbled into the archives, and found KAGAN—the final Lighthouse key...”

“我很庆幸你们能找到这里，这把钥匙交给你们，指挥部对你们如此看重，想必能力也非同.Translation: “I’m glad you found me. Take this key — Command’s faith in you means you’re exceptional… If you’re heading to the final control room, let me help...”

“我认为我们可能在基地的底部，这里停满了废弃的运输车，我们得找到通往上层区域的电.Translation: “We’re likely at the base’s bottom — it’s full of abandoned transports. Find the elevator to upper levels.”

“战士们，不管接下来会遇到什么，我们必需殊死一搏...”.Translation: “Warriors, whatever comes next, we fight to the death...”

“房间里有收音机，试试看能不能获取一些有用的信息”.Translation: “There’s a radio in the room, see if it has intel.”

“收到！我们已经火速派出增员，不过他们应该还需要一段时间，不过你们不用担心，我们.Translation: “Roger! Reinforcements en route, but they’ll take time. Don’t worry — our fighters patrol this area. I’ve uploaded your coordinates; they’ll assist first.”

“有什么动静，不好，所有人快离开电梯井！”.Translation: “Movement — shit! Everyone, evacuate the elevator shaft!”

“核心好像有反应了，我们快去到室外，重新与指挥部取得联系，Asterac队长，我.Translation: “The core’s reacting! Get outside to reestablish comms with Command. Captain Asterac, we...”

“核心成功启动了！强大的能量竟然被控制住了！不对，上空的光环是什么？算了...管.Translation: “Core activated! The energy’s contained! Wait—what’s that halo above? No time… just go!”

“核心能量溢出，请所有测试人员立刻离开基地，重复！所有测试人员离开基地！”.Translation: “Core energy overflow — all personnel evacuate immediately. Repeat! All personnel evacuate!”

“求你了，队长，我深知我已命不久矣，但请允许我陪伴你们最后一战，既是为了灯塔，也.Translation: “Please, Captain… I know I’m dying, but let me join your final stand — for the Lighthouse, and for Falling Snow…”

“电梯不久就会启动(20秒)，保住我们的安全！.Translation: “Elevator activating soon (20 sec) — keep us safe!

“电梯塌陷了，我们必须从电梯框架爬上去，但是我不能保证电梯是否不再运行...”.Translation: “The elevator collapsed—climb the shaft frame, but I can’t guarantee it won’t move...”

“电梯正在重启，不要让他们接近这里！防守20秒”.Translation: “Elevator rebooting — don’t let them near! Hold for 20 sec.”

“直到最后，没有什么可以被遗忘的了，我才想起，死亡也是记忆的一种方式…”.Translation: “At the end, with nothing left to forget, I realized death too is a form of memory…”

“看来这里的试验区拥有自己的备用电力，快离开控制室，我有种不祥的预感...”.Translation: “This test zone has backup power — get out of the control room. I’ve got a bad feeling...”

“终于找到电梯了，试试看能否运作...我草！小心头顶！他们从上面进攻了！给我15.Translation: “Found the elevator — let’s test it… Fuck! Watch above! They’re attacking from the ceiling! Give me 15 sec — it’s coming!”

“给我15秒破解大门”.Translation: “Give me 15 sec to hack the gate.”

“给我25秒钟，我来破译大门”.Translation: “Give me 25 sec — I’ll decrypt the gate.”

“衔尾蛇小队是否安全？我们接到信息部通知，要求知晓你们的行动代号。”.Translation: “Is Ouroboros Squad safe? Intel Division requests your operation codename.”

“谢谢你...我代表整个落雪小队向你致敬。”.Translation: “Thank you… on behalf of Falling Snow Squad, I salute you.”

“越过中间的铁网，它看上去不是那么牢固”.Translation: “Cross the middle wire mesh — it looks unstable.”

“这是什么生物？！他的唾液有很强的腐蚀性！”.Translation: “What is this creature?! Its saliva is highly corrosive!”

“这里也藏有感染者，他们是怎么找到这里的...”.Translation: “Infected are here too — how’d they find this place...”

“这里似乎也停电了，从下面的大门过去，重启电力”.Translation: “Power’s out here too — go through the lower gate to restart it.”

“这里就是主控室了吧...”.Translation: “This must be the main control room...”

“这里是代号：衔尾蛇，我们在灯塔ALPHA核心，核心即将启动，请求接应！”.Translation: “This is Codename: Ouroboros. At Lighthouse ALPHA core—activation imminent. Request extraction!”

“这里的保安系统好像很早就启动了，里面究竟是什么地方...”.Translation: “Security systems activated long ago — what’s inside...”

“这里的布局...好像是一个收容室，但是通往其他楼层的电梯被摧毁了，我们只有一条.Translation: “The layout here... looks like a containment room, but the elevator to other floors has been destroyed. We only have one path forward...”

“这里的开关应该可以重启电力，快去试试”.Translation: “The switch here should restart the power. Go try it!”

“那里好像躺着一个人…快去看看”.Translation: “Someone seems to be lying there... Go check it out.”

“那里有电梯，也许我们可能通往上层，我去尝试启动！”.Translation: “There’s an elevator there; maybe we can access the upper levels. I’ll try to activate it!”

“风扇还在不断运作，抓紧两边的扶手，别被吹下去了！”.Translation: “The fan is still running; grab onto the handrails on both sides, don’t get blown off!”

”乘坐中央电梯，我们必须不断攀升！.Translation: ”Take the central elevator; we must keep ascending!

菲洛：做好你的份内工作即可，我所知DOC议会一向不与其他议会对立，你们作为地球最.Translation: Philo: Just do your part. As far as I know, the DOC council has never opposed other councils. You, as Earth's most powerful existence, surely have the means to handle extreme situations. As for me, I’m just acting as the situation dictates.

菲洛：还有，告诉Twilight，不要浪费时间去尝试窥探我的能力了，这没什么意义.Translation: Philo: Also, tell Twilight not to waste time trying to probe my abilities. It’s meaningless.

菲洛：这个也别问了…好像有人来电话了，我先告辞了，规矩你懂的。.Translation: Philo: Don’t ask about that either... Looks like I have a call coming in. I’ll excuse myself now. You know the rules.

（握住Asterac的手并沉思片刻）“倘若你决意赴死...我们也不会干涉...但.Translation: (Grasping Asterac's hand and pondering for a moment) “If you are determined to face death... we will not interfere... but it’s been hard on you all this time...”

“坚持90秒，这个生物好像很虚弱，注意躲避他的攻击”.Translation: “Hold on for 90 seconds; this creature seems weak. Be sure to avoid its attacks.”

“给我15秒破译大门”.Translation: “Give me 15 seconds to decode the main door.”
